name: CodeISM
title: The platform, ~the challenges~, and ~the Support~ you need to excel ~in competitive Programming~.

description.short: The coding club of IIT (ISM) Dhanbad, is your gateway to honing your programming skills and exploring the exciting world of coding; catering to students of all experience levels, from absolute beginners to seasoned coders.
description.long: CodeISM is the official competitive programming club of IIT Dhanbad. It is a group of passionate programmers who love to solve problems and are always ready to learn and grow. We aim to provide a platform for students to learn and excel in competitive programming. We conduct regular sessions on various topics ranging from basic to advanced algorithms, data structures, and problem-solving techniques. We also participate in various online contests and organize contests for the students to practice and improve their skills. We believe that competitive programming is not just about solving problems but also about learning and growing together as a community.

name: WebCSE
title: The platform, ~the challenges~, and ~the Support~ you need to excel ~in Web Development~.

description.short: The official web development club of IIT Dhanbad, WebCSE is your gateway to honing your web development skills and exploring the exciting world of web development; catering to students of all experience levels, from absolute beginners to seasoned developers.
description.long: WebCSE is the official web development club of IIT Dhanbad. We aim to provide a platform for students to learn and excel in web development. We conduct regular sessions on various topics ranging from basic to advanced web development, and we also participate in various online contests and organize contests for the students to practice and improve their skills. We believe that web development is not just about creating websites but also about learning and growing together as a community.

description.short: Udbhav is the annual day of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at IIT(ISM) Dhanbad. It serves as a platform for students to showcase their talents, foster unity within the department, and connect with faculty and alumni. The event features lectures, competitions, cultural performances, and industry talks, along with non-academic activities like stand-up comedy and design contests.
description.long: Udbhav is the annual day of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at IIT(ISM) Dhanbad. It serves as a platform for students to showcase their talents, foster unity within the department, and connect with faculty and alumni. The event features lectures, competitions, cultural performances, and industry talks, along with non-academic activities like stand-up comedy and design contests.

report.venue: Premier Inn Hotel, Whitefields, Bengaluru, India
Officer’s Mess, Chief Engineer (Air Force), Palam, New Delhi

description.short: Confluence is the annual alumni meet organized by the Computer Science and Engineering Society (CSES) at IIT(ISM) Dhanbad. It serves as a platform to strengthen the connection between alumni and current students, featuring discussions on career growth, skill development, and fostering interaction between alumni and the department.
description.long: Confluence is the annual alumni meet organized by the Computer Science and Engineering Society (CSES) at IIT(ISM) Dhanbad. It serves as a platform to strengthen the connection between alumni and current students, featuring discussions on career growth, skill development, and fostering interaction between alumni and the department.

name: SpeakUp
title: SpeakUp the ~Speaking Skills~ and ~Personality Development~ Society

description.short: SpeakUp is the Speaking Skills and Personality Development Society at IIT(ISM) Dhanbad. It aims to help students improve their communication skills, public speaking, and personality development. The society conducts workshops, seminars, and competitions to help students overcome their fear of public speaking and develop their personality.
description.long: SpeakUp is the Speaking Skills and Personality Development Society at IIT(ISM) Dhanbad. It aims to help students improve their communication skills, public speaking, and personality development. The society conducts workshops, seminars, and competitions to help students overcome their fear of public speaking and develop their personality.
